rules_text:
Enchant creature
Apparition [i](When enchanted creature dies, if it wasn’t a token, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying then return this to the battlefield attached to it.)[/i]
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink, hexproof from white and from black, and “As long as you have 30 or more life and an opponent has 10 or less life, this creature gets +6/+6 and has flying.”
